title: 求种子与命令
author: 烈火战狼
txt_content:
求一个在平原（不是粘土山或雪地就行）的峡谷（不求矿多）的种子
求一个加速度500%跳跃加500%的烈焰棒的命令方块码
求一个耐久满防摔满的皮革鞋命令方块码
求一个召唤巨人的命令方块码
求一个防御满水下呼吸满的骷髅头（最好有伤害附加）的命令方块码
求一个召唤卖各种稿子的村民（制铁师）的命令方块码
求一个召唤卖各种武器（一个是锋利500火焰附加500的价格64个绿宝石的钻石剑一个是力量500火矢500无限1的价格64个绿宝石的弓其余的不限）的村民（制铁师）的命令方块码
求一个召唤买各种食物的村民（屠夫）的命令方块码
一个是拿各种矿锭（铁、金、钻石什么的）换绿宝石的村民的命令方块码
求一个耐久满防摔满爆炸保护满火焰保护满的皮革鞋的命令方块码
注意是1.7.2的

replies.author: jimmy1234
replies.txt_content:
/summon Giant ~ ~1 ~  <--巨型僵尸召唤

/give @p minecraft:blaze_rod 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:1,UUIDLeast:356399507,UUIDMost:356399507,Amount:500.0,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}]}加500%速度烈焰棒，但是我干不到+500%跳跃，至少在1.7

/give @p minecraft:skull 1 0 {ench:[{id:0,lvl:32767},{id:5,lvl:32767}]}水下呼吸以及保护32767级的骷髅头

/give @p minecraft:leather_boots 1 0 {ench:[{id:1,lvl:32767},{id:2,lvl:32767},{id:3,lvl:32767},{id:5,lvl:32767},{id:34,lvl:32767}]}耐久，防摔，爆炸保护，火焰保护32767级的皮革鞋子

/give @p minecraft:leather_boots 1 0 {ench:[{id:2,lvl:32767},{id:34,lvl:32767}]}耐久和摔落32767级皮革鞋子

/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:3,Career:1,CareerLevel:9999999,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:6,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:iron_pickaxe,Count:1,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:5,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:golden_pickaxe,Count:1,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:3,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:wooden_pickaxe,Count:1,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:4,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:stone_pickaxe,Count:1,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:7,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:diamond_pickaxe,Count:1,Damage:0}}]}}所有稿子都买的铁匠村民

/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:3,Career:1,CareerLevel:9999999,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:64,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:diamond_sword,Count:1,Damage:0,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:500},{id:20,lvl:500}]}}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:64,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:bow,Count:1,Damage:0,tag:{ench:[{id:48,lvl:500},{id:50,lvl:500},{id:51,lvl:1}]}}}]}}
卖武器铁匠村民

/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:4,Career:1,CareerLevel:9999999,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:bread,Count:2,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:6,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:cake,Count:1,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:2,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:pumpkin_pie,Count:4,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:2,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:cooked_chicken,Count:4,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:2,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:cooked_beef,Count:4,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:2,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:cooked_porkchop,Count:4,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:baked_potato,Count:2,Damage:0}}]}}
买各种食物屠夫

/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:0,Career:1,CareerLevel:9999999,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:iron_ingot,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:3,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:gold_ingot,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:4,Damage:0}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:minecraft:diamond,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:minecraft:emerald,Count:10,Damage:0}}]}}
矿物换绿宝石的村民

种子我给不出但是命令我全给了
